abstract: 'The carpet-stained floor, from all sorts of youth activities.'
description: Shawn Reece had no confidence and stayed at home when he wasn't at school. That is, until his friend convinced him to come along to Shop 16, a youth centre run by the Salvation Army in Reservoir.
